name: Spider-Man
description: After being bitten by a genetically-modified spider, a shy teenager gains spider-like abilities that he uses to fight injustice as a masked superhero and face a vengeful enemy.

review.author: 0U
review.heading: I enjoyed this movie
review.reviewBody: That movie starts the string of the spider man that I'm grown with and raise the bar really high for the next super hero movie which comes soon after it. This part is really good synthesized. I can tell much more good thing abouy the movie but you can make them on your own.

keywords: superhero,based on comic,peter parker character,ben parker character,spider man character
